localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 'Save the World' is a game for 3 or more people where players compete, collaborate and everything in between to save the world. The goal of the game is for everyone to agree on a solution to a randomly chosen disaster, like an asteroid strike.
blogPost.body: 'Save the World' is a game for 3 or more people where players compete, collaborate and everything in between to save the world. The goal of the game is for everyone to agree on a solution to a randomly chosen disaster, like an asteroid strike.
blogPost.title: Save The World - The card game for humanity
blogPost.author: Neeraj Thakur

localize.description: “拯救世界”是一款3人或3人以上的游戏，玩家们为了拯救世界而相互竞争、协作。这个游戏的目标是让每个人就随机选择的灾难的解决方案达成一致，比如小行星撞击。
“拯救世界”是一款3人或3人以上的遊戲，玩家們爲了拯救世界而相互競爭、協作。這個遊戲的目標是讓每個人就隨機選擇的災難的解決方案達成一致，比如小行星撞擊。

previous.title:
The I told you so's should not be going to the investors who bought GME in the past week but the charlatans and promoters who stoked the flames of outrage b/c they care more about social media clout than actually helping ppl

And these hucksters all knew better

localize.full_text:
我告诉过你的，不应该是过去一周买入GME的投资者，而是那些煽动愤怒火焰的骗子和促销员，因为他们更关心社交媒体的影响力，而不是真正帮助人们。

而这些骗子们都知道

我告訴過你的，不應該是過去一週買入GME的投資者，而是那些煽動憤怒火焰的騙子和促銷員，因爲他們更關心社交媒體的影響力，而不是真正幫助人們。

而這些騙子們都知道
